title: Gorgeous 2bd/2ba Townhouse! Two Weeks FREE with Immediate Move-in!!
posting_body: Two Weeks FREE with Immediate Move-in!!
Gorgeous 2bd/2ba Townhouse with Hardwood Floors and Private Patios!
Apply and move in within 48hrs to get two weeks free!
Please do not reply to this ad directly, use the contact information below.
The Strawberry Apartments is a 16-unit multifamily property that was built in 1977.
It is conveniently located in Lake Hills Bellevue, one of the nicest and most friendly neighborhoods on the Eastside.
The richness of the community lies in its extensive system of open space, trails, and wetlands.
Lake Hills also neighbors Bellevue College, Microsoft, downtown Bellevue and some of Washington’s best school districts.
The Strawberry features primarily 2-bedroom and 3-bedroom units.
These luxury units also offer spacious floor plans, living rooms, washer and dryer in unit, granite countertops, and hardwood floors.
- Bike or walk to the heart of Bellevue, transit centers, shopping areas.
This spacious and beautifully lit 2-bedroom townhouse features very high ceilings, a unique fireplace, hardwood floors, in-unit laundry, free parking, and private outdoor space!
Utilities: Flat Rate of $95/month + $35 per additional person
Our online leasing process makes moving simple!
Applications can be found online at <URL>
Cost: $50 application fee, $500 holding deposit (will be applied to security deposit)
Screening Criteria: Verified income of 3x monthly rent, a credit score of 650 or higher, no open bankruptcies, no past landlord-tenant disputes with judgment in favor of the landlord.
(Applicants who do not meet these criteria may be accepted on a case-by-case basis and/or with a qualifying Cosigner/Guarantor.)
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
*Disclaimer: Advertised photos may be of a similar unit in the building.
All applicants are encouraged to tour the property before lease signing to confirm unit details.
